title: Mathematics-Integrated Education Using Computer Vision-Based Mechatronics Training Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental robotics concepts, understanding of 2D coordinate systems, basic programming knowledge, high school-level mathematics (functions/vectors)
context.additional_context: Experimental module integrating LEGO mobile robots with computer vision systems in a BYOD environment, combining online theoretical learning with offline hands-on sessions

learning_goals: Learners will apply coordinate system conversion formulas through 2D robot position tracking and calculate with an error rate of 5% or less.
Learners will derive differential equations to analyze velocity/acceleration changes of moving objects through computer vision data analysis.
Development of project deliverables to solve real-world problems in mechatronics systems through mathematical modeling
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
